sourcesContent:
import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import "./singlePost.css"; import axios from "axios"; export default function SinglePost() { const location = useLocation() // location.pathname.split("/")[2] gives exact id of that post by splitting through "/" console.log(location.pathname.split("/")[2]) const path = location.pathname.split("/")[2] useEffect(() => { const getPost= async()=>{ const res= await axios.get("/posts/"+path); console.log(res) } getPost(); }, [path]) return (
